verses.verse: Or are ye ignorant <S%G50><s%>, brethren <S%G80><s%> (for <S%G1063><s%> I speak <S%G2980><s%> to men who know <S%G1097><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%>), that <S%G3754><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> hath dominion over <S%G2961><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> for <S%G1909><s%> so <S%G3745><s%> long <S%G5550><s%> time as <S%G3745><s%> he liveth <S%G2198><s%>?

For <S%G1063><s%> the woman <S%G1135><s%> that hath a husband <S%G5220><s%> is bound <S%G1210><s%> by law <S%G3551><s%> to <S%G435><s%> the husband <S%G435><s%> while he liveth <S%G2198><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> the husband <S%G435><s%> die <S%G599><s%>, she is discharged <S%G2673><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> of <S%G435><s%> the husband <S%G435><s%>.

So <S%G686><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> if <S%G1437><s%>, while <S%G2198><s%> the husband <S%G435><s%> liveth <S%G2198><s%>, she be joined <S%G1096><s%> to <S%G435><s%> another <S%G2087><s%> man <S%G435><s%>, she shall be called <S%G5537><s%> an adulteress <S%G3428><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> the husband <S%G435><s%> die <S%G599><s%>, she is <S%G2076><s%> free <S%G1658><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%>, so that <S%G3588><s%> she <S%G846><s%> is <S%G1511><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> adulteress <S%G3428><s%>, though she be joined <S%G1096><s%> to <S%G435><s%> another <S%G2087><s%> man <S%G435><s%>.

Wherefore <S%G5620><s%>, my <S%G3450><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%>, ye <S%G5210><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> were made dead <S%G2289><s%> to the law <S%G3551><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the body <S%G4983><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%>; that <S%G1519><s%> ye <S%G5209><s%> should be joined <S%G1096><s%> to another <S%G2087><s%>, even to him who was raised <S%G1453><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> we might bring forth fruit <S%G2592><s%> unto God <S%G2316><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> we were <S%G1510><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%>, the sinful <S%G266><s%> passions <S%G3804><s%>, which were <S%G3588><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%>, wrought <S%G1754><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> members <S%G3196><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> bring forth fruit <S%G2592><s%> unto death <S%G2288><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> now <S%G3570><s%> we have been discharged <S%G2673><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%>, having died <S%G599><s%> to that wherein1722, 3739 we were held <S%G2722><s%>; so that <S%G5620><s%> we <S%G2248><s%> serve <S%G1398><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> newness <S%G2538><s%> of the spirit <S%G4151><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> in oldness <S%G3821><s%> of the letter <S%G1121><s%>.

What <S%G5101><s%> shall we say <S%G2046><s%> then <S%G3767><s%>? Is the law <S%G3551><s%> sin <S%G3361><s%>? God forbid <S%G1096><s%>. Howbeit <S%G235><s%>, I had <S%G1097><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> known <S%G1097><s%> sin <S%G1487><s%>, except <S%G3361><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> I had <S%G1492><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> known <S%G1492><s%> coveting <S%G1487><s%>, except <S%G3361><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> had said <S%G3004><s%>, Thou shalt <S%G1937><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> covet <S%G1937><s%>:

but <S%G1161><s%> sin <S%G266><s%>, finding <S%G2983><s%> occasion <S%G874><s%>, wrought <S%G2716><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> me <S%G1698><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the commandment <S%G1785><s%> all manner of <S%G3956><s%> coveting <S%G1939><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> apart <S%G5565><s%> from the law <S%G3551><s%> sin <S%G266><s%> is dead <S%G3498><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> was alive <S%G2198><s%> apart <S%G5565><s%> from the law <S%G3551><s%> once <S%G4218><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G2064><s%> the commandment <S%G1785><s%> came <S%G2064><s%>, sin <S%G266><s%> revived <S%G326><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> died <S%G599><s%>;
and <S%G2532><s%> the commandment <S%G1785><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> was unto <S%G1519><s%> life <S%G2222><s%>, this I <S%G3427><s%> found <S%G2147><s%> to be unto <S%G1519><s%> death <S%G2288><s%>:

for <S%G1063><s%> sin <S%G266><s%>, finding <S%G2983><s%> occasion <S%G874><s%>, through <S%G1223><s%> the commandment <S%G1785><s%> beguiled <S%G1818><s%> me <S%G3165><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> it <S%G846><s%> slew me <S%G615><s%>.

So <S%G5620><s%> that the law <S%G3551><s%> is holy <S%G40><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the commandment <S%G1785><s%> holy <S%G40><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> righteous <S%G1342><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> good <S%G18><s%>.

Did <S%G1096><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> that which is good <S%G18><s%> become <S%G1096><s%> death <S%G2288><s%> unto me <S%G3361><s%>? God forbid <S%G1096><s%>. But <S%G235><s%> sin <S%G266><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> it might be shown <S%G5316><s%> to be sin <S%G266><s%>, by working <S%G2716><s%> death <S%G2288><s%> to me <S%G3427><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> that which is good <S%G18><s%>; â€” that <S%G2443><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the commandment <S%G1785><s%> sin <S%G266><s%> might become1096, 2596 exceeding <S%G5236><s%> sinful <S%G268><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> we know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> spiritual <S%G4152><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> carnal <S%G4559><s%>, sold <S%G4097><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> sin <S%G266><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> that which <S%G3739><s%> I do <S%G2716><s%> I know <S%G1097><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> not what <S%G3739><s%> I would <S%G2309><s%>, that <S%G5124><s%> do I <S%G4238><s%> practise <S%G3756><s%>; but <S%G235><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> I hate <S%G3404><s%>, that <S%G5124><s%> I do <S%G4160><s%>.

But if <S%G1487><s%> what <S%G1161><s%> I would <S%G2309><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>, that <S%G5124><s%> I <S%G5124><s%> do <S%G4160><s%>, I consent unto <S%G4852><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> it is good <S%G2570><s%>.

So <S%G1161><s%> now <S%G3570><s%> it is no more <S%G3765><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> that <S%G3765><s%> do <S%G2716><s%> it <S%G846><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> sin <S%G266><s%> which dwelleth <S%G3611><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> me <S%G1698><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> I know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> me <S%G1698><s%>, that <S%G5124><s%> is <S%G2076><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%>, dwelleth <S%G3611><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> good thing <S%G18><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> to will <S%G2309><s%> is present <S%G3873><s%> with me <S%G3427><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> to do <S%G2716><s%> that which is good <S%G2570><s%> is <S%G2147><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> the good <S%G18><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I would <S%G2309><s%> I do <S%G4160><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>: but <S%G235><s%> the evil <S%G2556><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I would <S%G2309><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>, that <S%G5124><s%> I practise <S%G4238><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> what <S%G5124><s%> I would <S%G2309><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>, that <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> do <S%G4160><s%>, it is no more <S%G3765><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> that <S%G3765><s%> do <S%G2716><s%> it <S%G846><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> sin <S%G266><s%> which dwelleth <S%G3611><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> me <S%G1698><s%>.

I find <S%G2147><s%> then <S%G686><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%>, to <S%G2309><s%> me <S%G1698><s%> who <S%G3754><s%> would <S%G2309><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> good <S%G2570><s%>, evil <S%G2556><s%> is present <S%G3873><s%>.
For <S%G1063><s%> I delight <S%G4913><s%> in the law <S%G3551><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the <S%G444><s%> inward <S%G2080><s%> man <S%G444><s%>:

but <S%G1161><s%> I see <S%G991><s%> a different <S%G2087><s%> law <S%G3551><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> members <S%G3196><s%>, warring against <S%G497><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> of <S%G3563><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> mind <S%G3563><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> bringing <S%G163><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> into captivity <S%G163><s%> under the law <S%G3551><s%> of sin <S%G266><s%> which is <S%G5607><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> members <S%G3196><s%>.

Wretched <S%G5005><s%> man <S%G444><s%> that I am <S%G1473><s%>! who <S%G5101><s%> shall deliver <S%G4506><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the body <S%G4983><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> death <S%G2288><s%>?

I thank <S%G2168><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%>. So <S%G686><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> of myself <S%G846><s%> with the mind <S%G3563><s%>, indeed <S%G1398><s%>, serve the law <S%G3551><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> with the flesh <S%G4561><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> of sin <S%G266><s%>.
